mapper.select: select u.id, u.password, u.role, u.name, u.email, u.phone_number as phoneNumber, u.create_time as createTime, case u.role when 'TEA' then t.college_id when 'STU' then s.major_id end as otherInfo from user u left join teacher t on t.id = u.id left join student s on s.id = u.id where u.role = #{role}

select s.id as id, s.name as `name`, s.direction as direction, s.difficulty as difficulty, s.technology as technology, s.describe as `describe`, u.name as createTeacher, m.name as major from subject s left join `user` u on u.id=s.create_teacher_id left join major m on m.id=s.major_id where s.id = #{id}
